channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Otter Blocks
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Otter Blocks

item.title: CVE-2024-2729|2024-04-18T05:00:02.373Z -- Unknown -- Otter Blocks
item.description: The Otter Blocks WordPress plugin before 2.6.6 does not properly escape its mainHeadings blocks' attribute before appending it to the final rendered block, allowing contributors to conduct Stored XSS attacks.
